Apocalypse:So Insecticons you are saying I have to kil a Chivtron in 
order to join you guys?Hmmm that should be easy but my energy is low 
I need to meditate to bring my energy up.When I'm done I'll bring a 
Chivtron out here to destroy.Is that ok with you Insecticons?
He then sits down in a trance like state he starts meditating 
bringing up his energy and his strength.
Thinks inside mind:I never turn my back on Allies but of course they 
arent really helping me to protect the base.They're probably sitting 
in there drinking hot energon telling jokes to eachother.
A green glow starts to form around him meaning his power is up to 
100% now he h to wait for a red glow for his strength.
In mind again:I wonder who is the weakest Chivtron?Hmm I think I'll 
call out Windlord for assistence.Yeah I'll call out Windlord for his 
death muahahaha.
Starts glowing bright red.Gets out of his trance and is now ready to 
fight.
Apocalypse:Windlord get out here please I need your assistence its an 
emergency!
